mapper.select: select d.data_id as dataID , d.mac_type as macType , d.mac_start as macStart, d.mac_current as macCurrent, d.mac_end as macEnd, d.data_size as macLength, d.record_org as recordOrganization, d.project_id as projectID, d.data_status as dataStatus, d.import_date as importDate from fm_mac_data as d where mac_type = #{type};

select d.data_id as dataID , d.mac_type as macType , d.mac_start as macStart, d.mac_current as macCurrent, d.mac_end as macEnd, d.data_size as macLength, d.record_org as recordOrganization, d.project_id as projectID, d.data_status as dataStatus, d.import_date as importDate from fm_mac_data as d where record_org = #{org} AND mac_type = #{type} AND (data_status=1 or data_status=0) order by import_date ASC;

select fdd.detail_id as detailID, fdd.data_id as dataID, fdd.mac_start as macStart, fdd.mac_end as macEnd, fdd.mac_size as macLen, fdd.factory as factory, fdd.output_date as outputTime from fm_mac_data_detail as fdd where fdd.data_id = #{dataID};
